keyMoments.title: Hockera's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Hockera appears and attacks Nami and Franky, commanding an army of Domo Penguins and using his hockey-themed combat style.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of the third son of the Accino Family and demonstration of his unique fighting abilities.
keyMoments.quote: You'll make a fine present for Papa! Kekeke!

keyMoments.title: Battle Against Franky
keyMoments.description: Hockera engages in combat with Franky, using his freezing ice pucks as weapons.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Hockera's combat capabilities and his command over Domo Penguins.

abilities.description: Hockera drops numerous ice pucks and rapidly strikes them toward targets, creating a barrage of freezing projectiles that freeze opponents on impact.
Hockera can command armies of Domo Penguins to attack enemies and perform various tasks.

relationships.description: Hockera is the third son of Don Accino and works as a bounty hunter for the family.

reveals.information: Uses hockey-themed combat with freezing ice pucks
Third son of Don Accino and member of the Accino Family bounty hunters

keyMoments.title: Salchow and Arbell's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Salchow and his wife Arbell encounter Usopp and Sanji, displaying their figure skating-based fighting style and extreme affection for each other.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of the married couple bounty hunters whose constant romantic displays irritate their opponents.

abilities.description: Salchow catches Arbell by the hands and spins, hitting enemies with her ice skates in a figure skating-themed combination attack.
A spinning attack where Salchow throws Arbell at enemies.

abilities.abilityName: High Jump Dai Kaiten Ultra Love Throw
abilities.description: The couple's supreme combination attack involving acrobatic figure skating moves.

relationships.description: Salchow is married to Arbell and they are extremely affectionate toward each other, constantly expressing their love.
Salchow is married to Don Accino's eldest daughter Arbell.

reveals.information: Uses acrobatic figure skating-based combination attacks with wife Arbell
Married to Arbell, eldest daughter of Don Accino

keyMoments.title: Salchow and Arbell's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Arbell and her husband Salchow encounter Usopp and Sanji, displaying their figure skating-based fighting style and extreme affection for each other.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Don Accino's eldest daughter and her unique fighting partnership with her husband.

abilities.description: Arbell uses her ice skates as weapons, performing ramming attacks and acrobatic moves.
Arbell performs various figure skating-based combination attacks with her husband including Love Swing, Love Throw, and Ultra Love Throw.

relationships.description: Arbell is married to Salchow and they are extremely affectionate toward each other, constantly expressing their love.
Arbell is the eldest daughter of Don Accino.
Arbell is the older sister of Lil.

reveals.information: Uses ice skates as weapons in figure skating-based combat
Eldest daughter of Don Accino and member of the Accino Family

keyMoments.title: Brindo's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Brindo appears and attacks Luffy, Chopper, and the Phoenix Pirates, demonstrating the magnetic combination abilities he shares with his twin brother Campacino.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of one of the Accino twin brothers and their unique magnetic powers.

keyMoments.title: Battle with Luffy and Phoenix Pirates
keyMoments.description: Brindo engages in combat with Luffy, Chopper, and members of the Phoenix Pirates.

abilities.description: A magnetic ability shared with twin brother Campacino. When Brindo glows red and Campacino glows blue, they are magnetically attracted. They can reverse the colors to repel each other, allowing for rapid movement and combo attacks.
Despite his large size, Brindo is very acrobatic and can perform skillful and fast moves.

relationships.description: Brindo is the twin brother of Campacino. They work together using their magnetic combination abilities.
Brindo is one of the sons of Don Accino.

reveals.information: Possesses magnetic combination abilities with twin brother Campacino
Member of the Accino Family, twin brother of Campacino

keyMoments.title: Lil's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Lil appears before Nico Robin on the Thousand Sunny, presenting herself as an innocent young girl wanting to play.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of the youngest Accino family member who uses her innocent appearance to deceive opponents.

keyMoments.title: Lil Asks Robin to Play
keyMoments.description: Lil approaches Robin, calling her 'big sister' and asking her to play, revealing her loneliness and jealousy of her sister's husband.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Lil's character as both deceptive and genuinely lonely within the Accino Family.

abilities.description: Lil can control flying fish creatures that can steal objects like pirate flags.
Lil can command plant vines in the Accino Family's greenhouse.
Lil uses her young appearance and calm demeanor to deceive others into thinking she is innocent.

relationships.description: Lil is the second daughter and youngest child of Don Accino.
Lil is the younger sister of Arbell and is jealous of Arbell's husband Salchow because he takes all of Arbell's attention.
Lil approaches Robin calling her 'big sister' and confides in her about her loneliness, though this may be part of her deceptive nature.

reveals.information: Appears innocent but is deceptive; feels lonely and jealous of her sister's husband
Youngest child of Don Accino and member of the Accino Family
